metadata.title: CVE-2018-8778 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Ruby before 2.2.10, 2.3.x before 2.3.7, 2.4.x before 2.4.4, 2.5.x before2.5.1, and 2.6.0-preview1, an attacker controlling the unpacking format(similar to format string vulnerabilities) can trigger a buffer under-readin the String#unpack method, resulting in a massive and controlledinformation disclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8778` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1
ruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ruby2.5 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1').
